* Tue Apr 07 2009 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 0.1.1
- Calling crosswiki possibility added into dictionary item
  constructor form;
- Author and date fields collor changed;
- Link to main page added to Logotype;
- RubricList viewlet disabled;
- Form colors changed;
- Special widget to enter tagannotation added;
- Google Adds added;
- IE compatibility enchanced;
- Cloud style changed;

* Thu Feb 12 2009 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 0.1.0
- Rubric cloud pprototype added
- Breadcrumb enchanced
- A few components moved into base skin for common use;

* Sun Nov 30 2008 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 0.0.2
- A few design enchancements.

* Tue Oct 21 2008 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 0.0.1
- first official release
